Detailed Description

template<typename _Item, std::size_t _max_items>
class TreeNode< _Item, _max_items >

Stores and handles serialization for items in a Tree.

Template Parameters:
_Item Type of the item being stored. Must support the serialization concept defined in Serialization.h
_max_items Max number of items that this stores
